author: dims
msg: Commons Logging package switches to SimpleLog when log4j is not present.
This results in [INFO] messages to show up on user console's and causes PANIC :-)

author: dims
msg: - Fix for Bug 8423 - AxisClassLoader cannot load service class
- Cleanup and centralize class finding mechanism (see loadClass in ClassUtils.java)
- Move the Hashtable of ClassLoaders out of JWSClassLoader so that it can be used to register and lookup ANY type of class/classloader.

msg: Describe how to add build-time source checks.

msg: Match the behavior of JAX RPC's toString

author: rubys
msg: Ensure that QNames survive serialization and deserialization.
